sentences.english: There's no difference between a cancer vaccine and any other cancer therapy.
sentences.chinese: 癌症疫苗和其他任何癌症治療手段之間並無差別。

sentences.english: There's no difference between a cancer vaccine and any other cancer therapy.
sentences.chinese: 癌症疫苗和其他任何癌症治療手段之間並無差別。

sentences.english: All of those cancers are relatively rare.
sentences.chinese: 以上癌症都是極爲罕有的。

sentences.english: When reexamined, no trace of cancer was found.
sentences.chinese: 複查時已沒有癌症的跡象。

sentences.english: "Before, everyone went to healers for things like liver problems or cancer," he said.
sentences.chinese: 以前，每個人都會找治療師看肝病或癌症這樣的問題。

sentences.english: Asbestos, used as a flame retardant, can cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 石棉用於阻燃劑，可能導致癌症。

sentences.english: People undergoing cancer therapy may have low blood-cell counts.
sentences.chinese: 正接受癌症治療的人血細胞數目會偏低。

sentences.english: "The cancer patient usually does not have this much time to waste, "Silber said.
sentences.chinese: “癌症患者通常沒有這麼多時間浪費，”西爾伯說。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美國居民無須服用碘片來預防輻射造成的甲狀腺癌症。

sentences.english: Hormones have long been associated with some forms of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 激素類的藥物一直被用作治療某些癌症。

sentences.english: Can we reduce our risk of cancer by eating organic food?
sentences.chinese: 通過食用有機食品我們能降低得癌症的風險嗎？

sentences.english: It is also an important risk factor for several cancers.
sentences.chinese: 它還同樣是一些癌症的重要風險因素。

sentences.english: I learned that he was suffering from cancer.
Why then is he not being healed of cancer?
sentences.chinese: 那爲什麼現在他無法愈痊癌症？

sentences.english: At the same time, the studies are more clearly defining screening’s harms.
sentences.chinese: 於此同時，這項研究清楚地顯示了癌症篩檢的危害。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
